text: Welcome Kiril! Sturdy looks awesome! I've been thinking/looking for similar solutions. I've explored improving development on a phone or tablet before, and I think replacing git with live sync will be necessary to properly allow that. It doesn't seem like your company is focused on mobile/tablet workflows yet, but I'm glad to see innovation in this space!
